name: Fireman Sam To The Rescue
description: Fireman Sam and friends are back to save the day in a brand new adventure! Help Sam and the Pontypandy fire crew in three action-packed missions; Brave to the core: Fire-fighter emergency, Rescue at Sea and Animal Rescue. Sam and the team are always on duty in this interactive story packed with fun puzzles and games! • 9 activities designed to build logic, problem-solving, memory and observation skills • Games include: Action Stations, Careless Campers, Action Stations, Naughty Norman, Cat Capers and more... • 2 modes of play: Story Mode and Free Play • 3 levels of difficulty to suit all ages • High score table to keep children challenged • Includes story narration for younger children
